title: Easy Fake Call (supports Wear)
summary: The official fake call app for Wear
description: Do you have a situation where you need to escape? We can help you!- Start Easy Fake Call- Make a fake call either from phone or wear device- Everyone else thinks you have call incoming- Escape!Features include:- Set caller number and name- Set delay with second precision- Call launch from phone or wear device- Choose caller picture from gallery (requires in app purchase)Supports Android wear smartwatches (moto 360, lg g watch, etc)
descriptionHTML:
Do you have a situation where you need to escape? We can help you!

- Start Easy Fake Call
- Make a fake call either from phone or wear device
- Everyone else thinks you have call incoming
- Escape!

Features include:
- Set caller number and name
- Set delay with second precision
- Call launch from phone or wear device
- Choose caller picture from gallery (requires in app purchase)

Supports Android wear smartwatches (moto 360, lg g watch, etc)
comments: Keeps Crashing Bought the Paid version but every time I try to add a picture it crashes. Managed to get a refund. Paid App Picture does not work but Free version is fine. 1* > 4* Why so expensive?
Awesome with wear Its cool! Use it with my wear watch all the time
